#include<cstdio>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int test;
	scanf("%d",&test);
	for(;test;test--){
		int n,i,j;
		scanf("%d",&n);
		int a[n];
		for(int i=0;i<n;++i)
		scanf("%d",&a[i]);
		sort(a,a+n);
		for(i=0,j=n-1;j>i;i++,j--)
		printf("%d %d ",a[j],a[i]);
		if((i==j)&&(n%2!=0))
		printf("%d",a[i]);
		printf("\n");
	}
}
